items.title: Tater Kegs
items.description: HANDMADE SEASONED TOTS WITH BACON, CHIVES AND CHEDDAR WITH SEASONED SOUR CREAM

items.title: Hudson Bay Tray
items.description: Enough for the whole "dam" group! Includes steak bites, fried pickles, onion petals, popcorn chicken & fried cheddar.

title: SANDWICHES, BURGERS AND SALADS
description: All of these Juicy Grilled Beef Burgers and Mouthwatering Sandwiches include a Side of Fries.

items.title: Bootlegger Burger
items.description: Something this delicious should be illegal! With bacon, American cheese, caramelized onion & a whiskey sauce.
